DOC.brief_summary: B2611002 is designed to study how safe and effective an investigational medication (PF-04991532) is in people with Type 2 diabetes. Subjects in the study will receive 1 of 5 treatments for 3 months. One of the treatments will be sitagliptin which is an approved drug, and another treatment will be placebo, which does not contain active ingredient.
DOC.brief_title: Study Of Safety And Efficacy Of PF-04991532 In Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Subjects with type 2 diabetes on stable doses of background medicines for management of diabetes; aged 1870 years; body mass index between 22.5 and 45.5 kg/m2 Subjects with type 1 diabetes, heart attack or stroke in the past 6 months, uncontrolled blood pressure, significant kidney disease.
DOC.keyword: safety and efficacy study with PF-04991532
